Title: Machine Learning Engineer
RoleDescription:
Are you passionate about Machine Learning? Do you know your way around data?In this role you'll be responsible for building machine learning based systems and conduct data analysis that improves the quality of our large geospatial data. Youll be developing NLP models to extract information, using outlier detection to identifying anomalies and applying data science methods to quantify the quality of our data. You will take part in the development, integration, productionisation and deployment of the models at scale, which would require a good combination of data science and software development. We offer a hybrid working model, with an expectation to be on-site at the office three days per week.We are looking for a candidate with a Masters degree (MSc) in a relevant field and at least 3 years of experience working with machine learning.
